plot: As Molly's father returns home, Diana begins to wonder if her ex might be ready to be a part of his daughter's life full-time.

When a body is found with it's organs appearing to be petrified, Diana investigates and asks Crane for help. Before they leave, Molly's father returns. When Crane sees the body, he believes a creature who , killed girls in his time is back. He says the creature impersonates someone his victim trusts before devouring them. That's when Diana thinks she knows who he's impersonating and who his next victim is. They tell Jenny and she makes a deal with Jobe to find the creature.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
